thread.section_title: Executive Hotel LeSoleil - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Simply Amazing
thread.title_full: Simply Amazing - Review of Executive Hotel LeSoleil, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: elvisjl
title: Simply Amazing
text:
I came to New York early and I was able to be checked in early for a room. The room is super clean and very well maintained. Everything was upgraded and convenient. I love the location and it just close to everything I needed.
I want to give a special shoutout to Moni, who was such a delight. Never have I seen an employee gone above and beyond to ensure their hotel guests receives the best customer service. She was so fun to talk to and full of joy. I saw her being able to be professional and more than help during difficult guests and rush hour. I would definitely come here again when I come back to New York again this summer.
This hotel and its services feels just like a 5-star hotel with 5-star customer service.
